headline: Flat Medicare Advantage Rates Put Clover Health Margins Under Fresh Scrutiny
summary: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services has proposed essentially flat Medicare Advantage payment rates for 2027. The proposal directly affects how much reimbursement Clover Health Investments (NasdaqGS:CLOV) may receive for its Medicare Advantage plans. This update comes as the sector is already reacting to pressures highlighted in UnitedHealth Group’s latest earnings report. Clover Health focuses on Medicare Advantage plans, so any change, or lack of change, in CMS payment rates matters...
